title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, August 21, 2020
description: It's the birthday of author Ellen Hinsey (1960), who said, "poetry is an independent ambassador for conscience: It answers to no one."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of author Ellen Hinsey (1960), who said, "poetry is an independent ambassador for conscience: It answers to no one."
